pa07
Class SuperRanker

java.lang.Object
  pa07.MovieRanker
      pa07.SuperRanker

public class SuperRanker
extends MovieRanker

This ranker is created by interviewing the user. The user info is used to define a rankMovie method that will rank movies using the user's info and the data from the ML100K dataset

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kristen Smith
